name: Govern
description: Hello, this is a little game that I made over the course of a day. You are the President of your country, you must obtain Greatness Points to become the greatest country of them all (there are only 5 other countries). This is a very simple game, however I do plan on making predecessors to this game, or just update this one in the future so it will have many more feature and much more depth to the game, based on ideas I have and feedback I receive.
